item.description:
I have chosen Pleasant Mtn in Denmark, Maine. The trailhead is on the noprtheast side of Lake Rd, 3.5 miles from Moose Pond Dam on 160 in Denmark, and 2.9 miles from 302 in East Fryeberg.

GPS coordinates: 44.007072, -70.853266
Map of 44.007072, -70.853266

Distance: 8.4 miles
Elevation gain: ~2100 ft
Book Time: 5 hours and 15 minutes
Trails: McKay Pasture Trail, Ledges Trail, Bald Peak Trail

This is in Denmark, Maine about 20 miles east of Conway
Pleasant Mtn is an isolated mass that stretches 4 miles. It was burned over in 1860 providing for many fine views. Pleasant Mtn is the location of Shawnee Peak ski area and a fire tower. We will be coming up the south side avoiding all signs of the ski area on the north. Once we reach the firetower we will continue on the ridge to Bald Peak, then return. It can be extended by walking further to the top of the ski area before returning.



Please keep your rsvp's up to date. Its very important that we have a true headcount, and not worry that your late or lost.

Make sure your hiker profile is complete so we can verify that your qualified to join us on this White Mountain hike.

See What to wear on a hike and pack water and food.

Your response/signing up for a hike certifies that you have read, understand, and agree with the NEHAAG disclaimer.

Carpooling is always advised and a great way to get to know your fellow members.
item.name: Sunny Day hike: Mt. Pleasant
